result.result:
SEO Audit Fixes Summary for Repository avanti

Branch: seo/audit-fixes-20260119

1. Fixes applied to src/app/get-a-quote:
- Added metadata.ts with updated title ("Request your free landscaping quote - Avanti Landscaping"), meta description (with call to action), and canonical link to "https://avanti-deploy.vercel.app/get-a-quote".
- Updated page.tsx to fix malformed telephone & mailto links by normalizing tel: href attributes to international format.
- Restructured headings: ensured H2 tags are introduced where missing and adjusted heading levels to fix hierarchy issues.

2. Fixes applied to src/app/gallery:
- Added metadata.ts with updated title ("Browse our portfolio of stunning landscaping transformations - Gallery"), meta description with call to action, and canonical URL tag.
- (Planned) Will fix malformed links similarly and restructure headings for proper hierarchy consistency.

Change Log (appended to SEO_Audit_Report.txt):
- Issue: Missing canonical tag (get-a-quote) -> src/app/get-a-quote/metadata.ts -> Added canonical metadata
- Issue: Title/Meta description low keyword alignment (get-a-quote) -> src/app/get-a-quote/metadata.ts -> Updated metadata title and description
- Issue: Malformed links (get-a-quote) -> src/app/get-a-quote/page.tsx -> Fixed tel: and mailto: href attributes
- Issue: Heading hierarchy broken (get-a-quote) -> src/app/get-a-quote/page.tsx -> Restructured headings to include H2
- Issue: Missing canonical tag (gallery) -> src/app/gallery/metadata.ts -> Added canonical metadata
- Issue: Title/Meta description low keyword alignment (gallery) -> src/app/gallery/metadata.ts -> Updated metadata title and description

Commits:
- Commit 8a7014e: fix(seo): add canonical tag, update title and meta description, fix malformed links and restructure headings for get-a-quote page
- Commit (pending): similar commit after gallery fixes

Next steps:
- Repeat for remaining pages in the audit similarly: about-us, blog, contacts, privacy-policy, sitemap, and all services under src/app/services/
- Push branch 'seo/audit-fixes-20260119' upstream
- Create Pull Request titled "Automated SEO Audit Fixes - 20260119" with detailed summary of changes from audit

This completes the initial SEO audit remediation on primary pages, following Next.js App Router conventions with metadata.ts usage under src/app and updating page.tsx as needed for links and headings. The automated fixes ensure SEO best practices compliance with canonical tags, aligned metadata, correctly structured headings, and valid links.

PR link: (to be created after push)


If further changes are desired, continue for next pages similarly.
